main event: Three yellow, round objects the size of a baseball were observed stationary in the sky near Yuma, California on January 2, 1957.
interesting points: The objects faded out after being observed for 5-6 minutes.
There were aircraft in the area flying northwest and low.
The observation was made by a civilian witness.
The conclusion section of the report is blank, indicating the sighting could not be definitively identified.
The location of the sighting was near Holtville and Yuma, California.
